instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: I cannot login.

output.Solution:
Provide your school administrator username and password.
After entering the credentials,
click Submit.

input.Problem Description: I need access to video tutorial of Teacher Training Assessments.

output.Solution: Login to Google Learning Center app.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: Why do my grades not show up? My name shows up but no grade numbers at all.

output.Solution: Check your assessment submissions to ensure they have been marked correctly.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: A video was not playing properly.

output.Solution: The most probable reason is network issues. Try watching another videos that requires low bandwidth. Contact your school administrator for assistance.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: Why am I not getting my pending assignment?

output.Solution: Make sure you've clicked Submit Assignment and marked your answer correctly.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: In which week does lecture 9 take place?

output.Solution: Week 3

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: When should teachers upload their grades?

output.Solution: Trainers can upload marks between 9pm - 11 pm Monday – Friday

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: When uploading reports, the form doesn't let me complete them since there is an error message that says "The file size exceeds the maximum allowed". What do I need to do?

output.Solution: Check your video recording for any errors before submitting.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: A video file is not available during preview.

output.Solution: Confirm that you have permission to access the app. For issues accessing course videos through Canvas, check these FAQs:

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: I am getting an error when attempting to submit my quiz.

output.Solution: The issue is because of your internet connection. Please connect properly and resubmit your answer sheet. For any other assistance regarding this issue kindly contact help@onlineplatformtraining.com

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: Is there an application that can be downloaded by teachers? What is its purpose?

output.Solution: Yes! Teachers download this app from Google Play Store called "Informational Services of TSAI". It contains useful information about our school's services/resources such as academic schedule updates, announcements, staff directory etc.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: "There was an error marking this assignment" appears next to my answer.

output.Solution:
"Check your Internet connection or network." Try closing other tabs/apps running at the background or restarting device.
If you are sure everything is okay but issue persists, contact our support team.

input.Problem Description: The teachers says that some of her assignments have been marked wrong since yesterday.

output.Solution: Clear browser cookies/cache, then check the results and update them.

input.Problem Description: How many questions am i required to answer correctly before my exam is considered successful?

output.Solution: At least 70% of all question answers need to be marked Correct/Correct+ in order for an examination grade to be "Pass". You can also set a different passing threshold for each subject by creating customised examinations.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: The quiz is locked even though we've all passed it.

output.Solution: Check that you have an active internet connection, check your browser settings, and ensure there's not a pop up blocker enabled.

input.Problem Description: I have set an objective test question, but when my teachers enter their solutions they see "Incorrect.".

output.Solution: Ensure that all answers were written correctly.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: (1) When adding an item there is some lag between hitting Add Assignment / Item & actually having it appear.,(2) When deleting items/assignments they do not disappear immediately, instead their status changes to pending deletion which means we need wait till next day's sync before removing them completely. It would be great that those tasks can take immediate effect rather than being put into queue.

output.Solution: Please confirm you have tried logging off and then signing back into DK Portal. You should also update your browser.

input.Problem Description: The assessment reports shows that my entire batch of 40+ students have not attempted any question at all.

output.Solution: Check your school/district's setting - see video tutorial here

input.Problem Description:
©I'm taking my CFA exam today but there's an issue with the eLearning component where none of us can access our learning materials.
©It says that "We're having technical issues" when we all tried logging into this platform at around 9 am EST.

output.Solution: Check your internet connection. Try restarting browser/logging off app/disabling plugins/updating Flash Player and check again.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description:
The exam was added correctly into DASHBOARD but when we open it via EXAM APP it shows an error message that is unable load this file - 
We can see all questions/answers under STAFF TAB.
What could be wrong?

output.Solution: Please send us screenshots of what you're seeing so our team can investigate further!

input.Problem Description: This is my message.

output.Solution: Check that your speaker volume is turned up.

input.Problem Description: I am unable to take my quiz.

output.Solution:
The issue is due to multiple tabs open.
Close all other applications besides Quizizz before attempting the exam again.

input.Problem Description: The course video link is broken.

output.Solution: Report this issue by clicking Report Problem

input.Problem Description: This is regarding my assignment feedback, how do i get it corrected?

output.Solution: Please send your video clip of the issue through the WhatsApp app.

input.Problem Description: Incorrect password is being used by user

output.Solution: Enter your username/email along with an active link you have received over mail. Then enter reset code sent via SMS. Reenter current password followed by new password twice.

input.Problem Description: When attempting to open my assessments tab in Moodle, the app displays "Oops! Something went wrong".

output.Solution: Make sure you have the latest version of our application.

input.Problem Description: I am unable to upload videos.

output.Solution: Check your Internet connection and make sure you have an up-to-date version of Adobe Flash installed.

input.Problem Description: Why can't my teachers see their students score?

output.Solution: Please reach out to your administrator/trainer.

input.Problem Description:
I need help regarding this question:
What is three times four?
Tag: Multiplication Problem.

output.Solution: The answer should be 12.

input.Problem Description: Teacher unable to access dashboard/report pages - all links direct back to home screen.

output.Solution: Please contact support for this query.

input.Problem Description: What is an eLearning portal?

output.Solution:
In order to view courseware, you must register via your school/district admin account.
This information will be sent once approval by head office has been given through this channel:

(video tutorial)

input.Problem Description: When do we have annual examinations?

output.Solution: January/February

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: I am trying to upload files but when I click "Upload" nothing is happening.

output.Solution:
Check video size - they should be smaller than 1 GB.
If so:
- Go to Teacher Training
- Click "Support", then “Assessment & Grading" tab
- Select your quiz
- Under Quiz details you will see an option called “File attachment (PDF)"
Click that link, select all of them at once by holding ctrl/cmd down and clicking each file individually,
click "Next", give it about 5 minutes for uploading process to complete.
Finally check if there's any error message.

input.Problem Description: The camera is not working when we attend video calls.

output.Solution: Check whether any of your webcam drivers have been updated recently; update them if necessary.

input.Problem Description: What should be done when an incorrect result is generated?

output.Solution: Check that all answers have been marked correctly; if any of them remain unmarked, retake the quiz.

input.Problem Description: A wrong question appears on multiple choice.

output.Solution: Log a support ticket with screen shot and description of the error.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: While trying to print my attendance sheet of day 9 today morning, the application is getting closed automatically.

output.Solution:
Ask your TSC to verify that you have login access properly.
Ensure internet connectivity
Check whether mobile date & time sync is working correctly or not.

input.Problem Description:
After submitting my exam, I saw the following message "Your examination submission was unsuccessful."
I clicked view details and received this error code - 4008."

output.Solution: Make sure you enter your username and password correctly. Try logging in from an alternate device if possible.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: In my final exam assignment there is an error.

output.Solution: The correct submission was saved already.

input.Problem Description: The app is asking me to enter my password which was sent via SMS/WhatsApp but when i click login nothing happened.

output.Solution: Please check your phone's settings or internet connection

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: I am having issues while attempting this quiz. When i click submit all of my answers disappear and then nothing appears so that means im supposed to fail right?

output.Solution:
Check if there is any pending issue regarding internet connectivity.

Try clearing app cache & app data by going into Settings -> Apps -> Triple tap on Quiz App -> Storage
Clear Cache ♥ Clear Data(if shown)

input.Problem Description: In Assignment 1, question 5 is marked wrong even though my answer was right.

output.Solution: It's possible that your browser saved the incorrect value before submitting. Please check if you made mistakes in any of the other questions and submit again.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Component Tag: Feedback feature/form submission issue reporting system,
input.Problem Description:
The submit feedback option does not work.
It just gives me an error message saying "Something went wrong"
And asks me to make another attempt,
I have done this many times but always get that response.

output.Solution:
"Something Went Wrong": This could be due to multiple reasons:
1. Server is down
2. User might not have permission to access particular section
Try logging a support request via "Contact us", give all information including screenshots when required.

input.Problem Description: The exam is not appearing.

output.Solution: Make sure you have access to internet at your location—log into another site if possible before opening the exam app.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: What should my teachers do when they see an assessment missing?

output.Solution:
Assessments can be found under Teacher Resources > Course Material & Modules. When you select this tab, make sure that all modules are checked and click next. A list of assessments will appear.
Make sure that each question is marked "Done" by clicking "Tick". You may also need to adjust your zoom settings so that there is more screen space visible.

input.Problem Description:
What is my account username?
I logged into TeacherPlus but now cannot access some of its features.

output.Solution:
Your login credentials are:
Email ID - xyz@gmail.com Password - your password

input.Problem Description:
I just uploaded 2nd year video
and my feedback was not shown.
Why is that?

output.Solution: Please make sure your teachers tag each component properly before upload

input.Problem Description: We have updated video links/URLs within Blackboard but videos are not playing when accessed through Google Meet.

output.Solution: Contact your local support team for further assistance.

input.Problem Description: I get an error message "Object reference not set to an instance of an object" when trying to access my test results.

output.Solution: Clear your browser's cache and restart the app. Contact admin for further help.

input.Problem Description: The date is not properly recorded in marks.

output.Solution:
Check that all dates have been input correctly by following these steps:
1. Go to Reports tab.
2. Select Quiz/ Test Results under “All Activities,” then click on an assessment item you want to view results for.
3. Review individual questions or select Summary Report at the top right corner. Only check those passed ones.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: Can we please have the old exams back? It was very hard when teachers used them compared to what they give us now! :((

output.Solution: Your request will be forwarded internally. Thank you!

input.Problem Description: When teachers go into their assigned section tab of Quizlet, they can't find any videos to teach their lesson.

output.Solution: Please check the date range selected at top right. The records were created within those dates.

input.Problem Description: There is some error that occurs when uploading exam results.

output.Solution: Make sure you submit at least one file per question.

input.Problem Description: How does this question appear?

output.Solution: It appears similar to all other questions except that it doesn't have any red dots above its icons. This is because each icon's answer key is unique so multiple choice tests don't need an individual missing answer key feature.

input.Problem Description: The results of this assessment show up blank.

output.Solution: Contact IT immediately

input.Problem Description: How do teachers edit quizzes?

output.Solution: Go to Teacher App > Assessment tab=> Unit Tests section & tap on Edit icon to update question/answers/options.

input.Problem Description: I have completed my registration. How do I login?

output.Solution:
In your app search bar type "Dashboard" then click on this link:
https://app.bacpondigitallearning.com/login?target=%2Fdashboard

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description:
I am unable to submit my homeworks.
When I click submit quiz/ assignment, nothing happens.

output.Solution: Log in to your Google account in Moodle app and check for updates. You may have lost internet connectivity while submitting the worksheet.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: How can teachers give instant feedback?

output.Solution: There is an option under Quizzes which allows you to submit your answer immediately after solving each question.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: Why do some of my teachers always get their grades wrong? What's going on?

output.Solution:
[Action] Teacher can verify scores by visiting this link
[Explanation] Logging into your account lets you check your progress.
[Reminder] Please visit us at [URL]

input.Problem Description: Incorrect school address tag in name/designation.

output.Solution: Update school information tag.

input.Problem Description:
I tried uploading two assignments today but both were rejected by your team. How can that be corrected?
Please advise.

output.Solution:
Your account may have been suspended due to violation of terms/rules of service. You must contact our support team via app help menu.
If you want this issue resolved urgently then please attach video evidence clearly showing how they violated rules alongwith proper screen shots.

input.Problem Description: I'm unable to take quiz now.

output.Solution: Login is enabled after 20 minutes of being idle

input.Problem Description:
There is an issue when trying to send notifications.

Description:
When attempting to notify multiple teachers at once,
the system sends but then fails to process them.

output.Solution: Contact your Administrator/Support team immediately.

input.Problem Description: The Assignment link appears but is blank.

output.Solution: Try refreshing your browser and logging into Google Apps, then click Try Again.

input.Problem Description: How can my users access videos?

output.Solution: The user needs to be logged into the app to view any of its components.

input.Problem Description: Incorrect number of choices reported.

output.Solution: Verify all options are selected by checking the submission screen. Also check that there is a quiz assigned/created before attempting this activity.

input.Problem Description: When sending an email from our app, sometimes teachers get this error message: §¼What went wrong? The item you have requested is currently unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

output.Solution: Provide contact details and they will resolve your issue.

input.Problem Description: In an objective question marked incorrect by me but flagged as corrected, when i open that individual questions panel shows all wrong options correct.

output.Solution: Log a ticket with screenshots.

input.Problem Description: My username/password doesn't work.

output.Solution: Check if you're logging into an outdated app version; check that your login details were copied correctly. Check if Caps Lock is active or if any other keystrokes have been made before trying again.

input.Problem Description: We have received feedback that teachers are unable to open their Assessments folder.

output.Solution:
Instruct them to close all windows
And then relaunch Learn

input.Problem Description: Some of my attempts have shown 0 marks despite being marked correctly.

output.Solution:
This means there was an issue while submitting your response, which may be due to technical reasons.

Make sure you upload the question paper within given deadlines. Verify that all fields remain visible before attempting submission.

input.Problem Description: My classroom isn't showing up anymore.

output.Solution: Inform us of any recent changes made by your school administrators.

input.Problem Description: Incorrectly tagged answers.

output.Solution: Incorrect tag removed.

input.Problem Description: Why is the percentage incorrect?

output.Solution: Make sure you have selected all questions correctly.

input.Problem Description: The assignment is available but shows "Waiting". When will this be fixed?

output.Solution: Once instructor uploads all solutions, they can start distributing them immediately.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: How do teachers access results of assignments?

output.Solution: They can see their scores directly within each assignment.

input.Problem Description: Our class is not appearing even though all my other classes appear.

output.Solution: Verify that this course was added by your instructor.

input.Problem Description: When can teachers expect their marksheets?

output.Solution: Once everything is verified and approved by school authorities, we will send your results through our app/website.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: I cannot see/access my course's assignments while other teachers can.

output.Solution:
Check that you're logged into your school account.
If not:
	Reset password,
Logout,
Re login

input.Problem Description: The app is stuck at 100% complete while showing my final score of 90%. No other activity can be carried out.

output.Solution: Clear your browser's cookies and restart the application

input.Problem Description: The quiz answers were wrong.

output.Solution: Log in to Teacher App > Feedbacks and raise this issue.

input.Problem Description: In quiz 1A, when do we have 3 attempts left?

output.Solution: Students get three tries per question, until they reach 20% of questions correct/incorrect.

input.Problem Description: My son's results show he got 20/20 but his actual score was 16 out of 30.

output.Solution: The exam system must have loaded an older version of your child's grades before you submitted it. Go into the portal now and download the latest assessment.

input.Problem Description: It's not letting me submit this week assignment even though i submitted last week.

output.Solution: Clear your browser cookies or check other devices/browsers.

input.Problem Description: When logging into Moodle, some of my videos won't open.

output.Solution: Make sure that you have enough disk space available by clearing your browser history. Logout and then login back into moodle once more.

input.Problem Description: The assignment feature is not working properly.

output.Solution: Make sure you have internet access.

input.Problem Description: What should be done next?

output.Solution: Implement feature that allows teachers to leave feedback.

input.Problem Description: The marks have not been updated.

output.Solution: Provide the required information.

input.Problem Description: Train teachers what to do when they receive an unanswered question.

output.Solution: Inform that this should be reported to administrators

input.Problem Description: Whenever teachers enter their login details they get an error message

output.Solution: Log a helpdesk support ticket.

input.Problem Description:
Which is true?
A. Teachers have three hours to input exam questions.
B. Students can review their exams online before submitting them.
C. Informatic staff enter grades manually into Kiosk once marking is complete.
D. All of these choices are incorrect.

output.Solution: True B

input.Problem Description: Some pages don't show up when they should be visible.

output.Solution: Report this issue directly to your school administrator/ IT team.

input.Problem Description: What is happening? A teacher uploaded their exams but all of them have disappeared! What should we do?

output.Solution: Make sure you did not accidentally click "Finish" before uploading your final exam. You can also check that there were indeed more than 20 questions by checking through each question's answers individually.

input.Problem Description: The calendar app is missing events.

output.Solution:
Please make sure you have updated your phone's software version. In case there was an issue while updating please uninstall
the App and then reinstall it again.

input.Problem Description: In my lecture videos there is an error that shows up whenever I click play:

output.Solution: Check your network connection and reload the video.

input.Problem Description: When teachers view their classroom performance assessment reports, there is an error message that says "Something went wrong while processing your request". What should they do?

output.Solution: Report this issue by providing all necessary details including screenshots

input.Problem Description: The form seems too long with many questions. What information do you want me to give?

output.Solution: Give all feedback details correctly.

input.Problem Description: The video player isn't working properly.

output.Solution: Contact IT Support.

input.Problem Description: The number of ratings teachers have given is incorrect.

output.Solution: Please check whether you've provided an honest rating or not.

input.Problem Description:
In my current class's section 9A, there is an additional box under their profile information that says "Grade Level" but not showing any value.
If we click this, nothing will happen.

output.Solution: The grade level should be updated. Log a helpdesk ticket.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: How do we get our grades back?

output.Solution: Email [email protected]

input.Problem Description: We have added more than 100 documents since uploading yesterday.

output.Solution: Re upload files and wait for successful sync.

input.Problem Description: Teacher's login details have been updated but he is not able to sign in.

output.Solution:
Log a request at support@teachpedia.in with your username, new password, and email ID.

Once confirmed by our team, we will notify you via SMS.

input.Problem Description: The app asks me multiple times to upgrade my phone's OS version, which is always at least 2 versions old.

output.Solution: Please update your device's software and restart the application. Your instructor will be informed of this issue.

input.Problem Description: I uploaded my assignments but they aren’t showing up.

output.Solution: It takes 2 working days to update grades. Please ensure that you have done all steps correctly before reporting the issue.

input.Problem Description: I'm unable to access my quizzes.

output.Solution: Go offline. Reconnect once done.

input.Problem Description:
What is meant by ‘performance level 1′?
	In my course dashboard there was this category of evaluation called Performance Level 1,
	and when we submitted our end semester assessment results they all went under that.
	The instructor said he could not see any scores but he showed me otherwise on his screen. How do i rectify this?

output.Solution: It means you did poorly overall during mid semesters exams or project submission. You can make up for these scores next year at your own risk.

input.Problem Description: The application is showing an error message "Oops! Something went wrong".

output.Solution: Make sure your internet connection is stable, check that you have sufficient network bandwidth/data balance, change browser settings to accept third party cookies, login with admin credentials—user name must be “admin@domain.com” and password must include special character(s). If this does not work, please contact us at support@email.com

input.Problem Description: Please update my school calendar.

output.Solution: Please enter your username/email address and password to access the app.

input.Problem Description: Can we watch videos while solving this quiz?

output.Solution: Please complete all questions before watching the video

input.Problem Description: How can I rate this course module? It isn't showing up.

output.Solution:
The rating is shown at the top of each activity/video.
If you didn't see any ratings section,
check whether your browser supports HTML 5 video tag.

input.Problem Description: The module is not visible.

output.Solution: Check your internet connection and then reload the course.

input.Problem Description: Which app do we login to?

output.Solution: Google Play Store

input.Problem Description: This week's grades were not shown, instead next weeks' was displayed.

output.Solution: Logs have been forwarded to support.

input.Problem Description:
How do teachers know that all their students have finished an assessment?
I want my app to remind them once they finish the test so there's less room for human error.

output.Solution:
Log into MySchool app > Assessments > Finished tests/assignments tab.
This displays how many students completed each question/assessment within a given timestamp range. You can see which questions need checking next time.

input.Problem Description: How do we upload videos?

output.Solution: Log into Instructor Dashboard > Course Materials. Click Video Assignments tab at left sidebar menu and click Add/Edit Videos icon to access video uploading feature.

input.Problem Description: The exam question says "Answer:" but is blank.

output.Solution: Please update your software or contact help desk.

input.Problem Description: What is the pass percentage of my class?
Incorrect number of videos loaded.

output.Solution: The issue is related to connectivity/loading. Please wait for few minutes before retrying the action.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description:
Why am I getting this error?
This is an unknown issue.
I have attached screenshots of my screen. Please advise.
Thank you.

output.Solution:
It appears that your question was not registered properly due to a connectivity issues between CISCO's online grading system. 
Please ensure all devices used by teachers are connected to wifi networks with strong signal strength before proceeding further. Also make sure they were updated recently and their browser versions also meet minimum criteria stated above:
The following information will be shared directly with Cisco support:
Device Model Number/Type - Smartboard Interactive Display
Product Serial number & Firmware version - SMART BOARD 4100 EDU 3.7C
Operating System Version - Android 7.0
Inbuilt Camera resolution - 1 megapixel
If possible please attach screenshot(s)
We request you to contact school administration immediately,
and share details via email ([email protected]).

input.Problem Description: When trying play videos over WiFi they do not load.

output.Solution: Check internet connection is stable and fast enough.

input.Problem Description: In some cases when teachers check their Assignment scores, they get an error message which reads "Unable to update score - Server Error." Please suggest what could be causing this.

output.Solution:
This indicates that there is either a connection/server issue at our end OR your school's internet bandwidth may not support downloading of large file sizes. To ensure reliability we restrict download size to 500 MB and recommend setting up faster WiFi access points around classrooms.

If you continue experiencing this, contact us here so we can assist further:

input.Problem Description: What is your name?

output.Solution: Mrs Xena Gonsalves

input.Problem Description: When teachers submit their work midway through marking an assignment—say they have entered 30 marks/questions so far - when that information is saved by clicking Next, all subsequent questions become uneditable.

output.Solution: Log a bug ticket describing which question numbers this affects, along with screenshots and videos.

input.Problem Description: The app is not working anymore.

output.Solution: Check that your internet connection is strong and try logging into another device If you're connected through school WiFi make sure there aren't any restrictions applied by the IT team. Update/reinstall the application  Make sure that all devices running the Vidya App have up-to-date operating systems

input.Problem Description: I can see all my videos except this last one, which says "File not found." What should I do?

output.Solution: Check that you have connected your device to WIFI/Mobile Data correctly before trying again. Also check whether there is any other application downloading simultaneously; make sure none of them uses high bandwidth while watching video files.

input.Problem Description: Why am I getting an error when trying to submit my exam? What do i need to change?

output.Solution: Make sure your phone is connected to a good wifi network and that you have updated all app updates on the device.

instruction: Given a Teacher Problem Report, Provide the Correct Solution.

input.Problem Description: We have received our annual online test that we need to complete within two weeks of receiving this message but today is August 21st 2020.

output.Solution: Ensure all questions have been completed successfully.

input.Problem Description:
I see this message every single day at 7am:
The application is busy serving other requests,
please wait for a few minutes before trying again.

output.Solution:
Make sure you have Internet access/connection. For security reasons, your browser blocks third party cookies.
Enable 3rd Party Cookies by going to `Settings > Advanced` and checking "Accept Third-Party Cookies"/

input.Problem Description: How can teachers view their progress?

output.Solution:
To see your progression towards completing this module, navigate to Teacher Dashboard
Click Modules Tab 
Choose Teaching Assessments/Teacher Professional Development Module

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: The assignment is marked wrong but I know I have completed all tasks correctly.

output.Solution: Make sure you've submitted your work before moving onto next question/section.

input.Problem Description: I received an error message when trying to submit my exam.

output.Solution:
Check your internet connection is working properly.
Report the issue by clicking "Contact Us" link under the login section of Moodle.

input.Problem Description: The "Assessments" tab is stuck at 100% complete when all assessments have been submitted

output.Solution: Check your internet connection and make sure there's no network issues.

input.Problem Description: Why is my gender male?

output.Solution:
To change your genders go into user preferences, update all of them there and click apply.
If you do not see this section then its because your administrator hasn't enabled these features yet so please ask him
your school principal/deputy director to enable these options.

input.Problem Description: The video is broken - it shows an error message instead of playing.

output.Solution: Check that other videos play correctly. Report this issue to our support team via email.

input.Problem Description: The system is telling me that my child did not submit an assignment while he actually submitted.

output.Solution: Have your child verify that all required fields were completed prior to submitting his work

input.Problem Description: The video is not playing.

output.Solution: Make sure you have an active internet connection.

input.Problem Description: Question Number 1 has an invalid tag.

output.Solution: Update question with proper tag.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description:
We need an option where teachers can select different question types rather than forcing them into picking 5 options each quiz question. For instance they might want some multiple choice questions instead of 5 true/false answers.
How do we add this feature? Thanks,
Teacher Name:

output.Solution: 'The Quizzes > Edit Mode > Questions screen now includes two check boxes labelled "Inline" vs "Multiple Choice", which allow you to configure your quizzes more flexibly by allowing Teachers to choose between these two formats at run time.'

input.Problem Description: "Hi, welcome back!". Teacher clicks this tag to sign into his/her account.

output.Solution:
"Username or password is incorrect." This means that either:
	"Email address": Teachers must have their email verified before accessing TTS.
	"Password": Passwords reset automatically monthly. Logins don't work immediately following resets."
In all cases, teachers should contact Support by clicking Help at the bottom of any page.

input.Problem Description: User account was created today but password not received till now.

output.Solution: Make sure login details were entered correctly.

input.Problem Description: In our school, we have three classes per grade - 9A/9C/8F while my daughter is registered under 8E. She wants me to change this.

output.Solution: Please contact us through email at [email protected]

input.Problem Description: My username/password isn't working.

output.Solution:
Make sure your user account is active and you have access to all features. 
Logging into Teacher Portal will not automatically activate an inactive teacher account.

If this issue persists, contact our customer service team.

input.Problem Description: The app is not letting me submit my quiz.

output.Solution: Check your internet connection. Close any other apps running in the background. Try another device if possible. Log a ticket with details for troubleshooting.

input.Problem Description: It says "Assessment is not accessible".

output.Solution: Check that your internet connection works by trying an interactive test quiz.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: My submission of task 1 is not being marked correctly.

output.Solution: The teacher should check all submitted assessments and update grades before submitting them.

input.Problem Description: What is an online course?

output.Solution:
Online courses let teachers create lessons around their own interests or needs.
Instructors design each lesson themselves - they decide what topics should be covered, how often people take quizzes, which videos appear next,
and even adjust difficulty levels automatically based upon performance.

input.Problem Description: The lesson about how teachers can improve their efficiency is incomplete.

output.Solution: Check your internet connection and reload the page.

input.Problem Description: The teachers cannot see my videos. I have verified that they're not private. Also there is an issue uploading lessons.

output.Solution: Ensure your camera's microphone option is enabled. Ask other users who don't face this problem to test whether you can hear their voice correctly.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: What should teachers do when they click play and videos don't appear?

output.Solution:
The video player is probably temporarily unavailable. Teachers can view lesson updates by going back into Canvas, viewing their courses & assignments
Alternatively, you could download all materials offline through Course Content before trying to access videos online again.
Contact your administrator regarding this issue.
Thank You!

input.Problem Description: What is the procedure/process when you wish to request additional computer setups?

output.Solution:
Teachers need to login into Teacher Dashboard of Vedantu through school email id and password.
Once logged into dashboard they have three options:
(i) Training Modules
(ii) Assessments 
(iii) Reports
They can click on any module based on their requirement.
output.How To: Click on View Video icon present next to the topic/module
output.Why Is It Important: To get certified online courses by teachers at zero cost.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: What should we do when teachers upload lecture videos but some fail validation?

output.Solution:
The issue is due to invalid URLs being added by staff, so they need to be informed about this process correctly before uploading them

Please see "Add/upload video files" at https://trainingportal.acadapp.com/videos/lecture_capture/

Log a query or support request here:
https://issuetracker.skillset.io/

input.Problem Description: What do you mean by "correct answer"? For instance, why would we give an incorrect score even though they got 3 of 4 questions right?

output.Solution: A person is marked wrong when he/she gives any incorrect response.

input.Problem Description:
Is there any way that teachers can add videos or presentations
as part of our course?

output.Solution: This is possible via an Instructor app feature. However, this functionality isn't available yet.

input.Problem Description: I want to submit my lab reports but whenever i click upload, nothing appears.

output.Solution: Go back into the app and select another video lecture for that topic to view.

input.Problem Description: A trainee completed all 6 modules but didn't pass her certification exam.

output.Solution: Trainers should complete at least 80% of assessments correctly before attempting their final exams.

input.Problem Description: A teacher is trying to make an event in her calendar but can't figure our how.

output.Solution: Confirm there's enough space left for more events by removing old ones before creating this new one.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: I just had an online quiz for my coursework assignment due tomorrow morning but there was some issue when logging into the system where it said that something went wrong so all of our answers were wiped out. Is this because we're currently unable to access Quizlet?

output.Solution: Log out then sign back in, maybe check your connection/internet speed? Make sure you have enough storage space in phone or laptop.

input.Problem Description: The videos aren't downloading/streaming.

output.Solution:
Check your internet speed and bandwidth. Update Flash Player. Try another browser or device.
If this is not working even in other devices / browsers,
contact help desk directly through email or phone.

input.Problem Description: The tracker is not showing all my marks and grades.

output.Solution:
Verify you're entering your score within 30 mins of submitting the quiz. Also verify whether there's any ongoing internet connectivity issue.
Please update us via live chat by clicking "Chat" button at bottom right corner of screen.

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: What is my progress report score?

output.Solution: Your latest module scores for all topics together make up your final exam grade of 80%. Your overall course average also contributes to 30% of this semester's grade.

input.Problem Description: Videos have stopped working.

output.Solution: Clear browser history and cookies.

input.Problem Description: I've watched all of my assigned modules but some topics aren't showing up.

output.Solution: Check your internet connection and make sure you have an active subscription.

input.Problem Description: The document contains information about what we need for unit 4

output.Solution: Correct information is added.

input.Problem Description: Incorrect login credentials.

output.Solution: Check username/password

input.Problem Description: The link doesn't work.

output.Solution: Report this issue via email to help@app.com.

input.Problem Description: The following questions were missing/incomplete:

output.Solution: Tag these questionnaires correctly: Question 1a, b, 2, 3b

input.Problem Description: I am unable to see all of my classes.

output.Solution: Please update your browser to latest version.

input.Problem Description: Why is this wrong?

output.Solution: The feedback form does not have any answers associated.

input.Problem Description: There is not enough space between questions.

output.Solution: Make sure each response takes up at least four lines of text.

input.Problem Description: Assignment 2 was created by me but my colleague cannot see her submission. What should she do?

output.Solution: It means that your class hasn't been successfully assigned a Problem tag and is missing necessary information needed to be tagged. Please contact Support so they can assist you.

input.Problem Description: I've forgotten my password.

output.Solution: Instruct them to click Forgot Password then follow steps in email.

input.Problem Description: The app does not allow me to select any option of my choosing.

output.Solution: Make sure you have selected all options before clicking submit.

input.Problem Description: What is the passing rate of Quiz 1?

instruction: Given a teacher problem report, provide the correct solution.

input.Problem Description: When will my lunch order be ready?

output.Solution: It'll reach you at 12 pm today.
